comment: This theorem, which is similar to Theorem 6.7 of [Quine] p. 42 and holds under both our definition and Quine's, relates logic substitution ~ df-sb and substitution for class variables ~ df-sbc . Unlike Quine, we use a different syntax for each in order to avoid overloading it. See remarks in ~ dfsbcq . (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2016.)
